author: roddey
msg: If one does not move the src pointer forward in all cases, one
might never complete the $&*# transcoding process.

author: roddey
msg: Added a getter for the doc type handler.

author: lehors
msg: removed namespace support from NodeImpl so that not every node since
it's only really needed for Element and Attr nodes,
introduced ElementNSImpl and AttrNSImpl so that only Element and Attr nodes
that actually have a namespace pay the price for it

author: lehors
msg: changed NodeImpl to not support any children so that
changed all classes that may have children to inherit from NodeContainer

author: abagchi
msg: Fixed COM object registration problem on Debug and remaining Release configurations
